reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Shared bathroom (no separate toilets, so if someone is in the shower, you can't use the loo), small beds, no wardrobe or TV in the rooms and difficult to find. Yet we were asked to remove our shoes in reception incase we damaged the floor (I refused). Also, the receptionist spent about 10 minutes telling us about the 'famed' hot tub only to finish by telling us that it was out of order. However, she failed to mention whether there was a bar or not (I still don't know). Dinner was an option but it was set so we ate at the local petrol station.
reviews.title: Awful, delusions of grandeur

reviews.text: Maybe it's just my age but sharing a bathroom with 20 year old backpackers is not my idea of fun.
